question: Which of the following kings Succeeded King Krishna I?
explanation: King Dhruva of the Rashtrakuta empire ruled the kingdom from 780 A.D. to 793 A.D. Dhruva was one of the most notable rulers of the Rashtrakuta Empire. During his reign, the Rashtrakuta kingdom expanded into an empire that encompassed all of the territory between the Kaveri River and Central India.
